title: Purge a file from history
description: Git is a popular version control system that allows developers to track changes in their codebase. However, sometimes it becomes necessary to completely remove a file from the repository's history. This lab will guide you through the process of purging a file from Git's history.

meta.title: Purge a File from Git History
meta.description: Learn how to completely remove a file from a Git repository's history, including sensitive information like API keys or passwords.
meta.keywords: version control, git labs, history, git, git playground, file purge, sensitive data

verify.name: Verify if purge is successful
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
